job_description:
A Data Engineer Senior / Lead - Media is sought by a company recognized by Forbes' 2023 Best Employer for Diversity, focusing on supporting and optimizing advertising campaigns through data analytics and engineering.

or, in lieu of a degree, a minimum of four years related work experienceExperience with AWS Services such as S3, SQS, SNS, Lambda, EC2, EMR, Aurora, and RedShiftProficiency in Linux / Unix shell, Git, Docker, Terraform, Snowflake, and strong SQL skillsExperience in programming and troubleshooting with PythonFamiliarity with data engineering tools like Prefect, dbt, Apache Spark, Apache Airflow, or similar tools

Last updated : 2024-03-19

Qualifications: or, in lieu of a degree, a minimum of four years related work experience
